org.apache.tomcat.websocket.WsWebSocketContainer

  • 使用WsWebSocketContainer的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.tomcat.websocket  
    org.apache.tomcat.websocket.server
    Server-side specific implementation classes.

    • org.apache.tomcat.websocket中WsWebSocketContainer的使用

      参数类型为WsWebSocketContainer的org.apache.tomcat.websocket中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      WsSession(Endpoint localEndpoint, WsRemoteEndpointImplBase wsRemoteEndpoint, WsWebSocketContainer wsWebSocketContainer, java.net.URI requestUri, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> requestParameterMap, java.lang.String queryString, java.security.Principal userPrincipal, java.lang.String httpSessionId, java.util.List<Extension> negotiatedExtensions, java.lang.String subProtocol, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> pathParameters, boolean secure, EndpointConfig endpointConfig)
      Creates a new WebSocket session for communication between the two provided end points.

    • org.apache.tomcat.websocket.server中WsWebSocketContainer的使用

      org.apache.tomcat.websocket.server中WsWebSocketContainer的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  WsServerContainer
      Provides a per class loader (i.e. per web application) instance of a ServerContainer.
